title: Tech Moves: Google engineering director Ankur Sinha joins Remitly as CTO - GeekWire
content: Tech Moves: Google engineering director Ankur Sinha joins Remitly as CTO  GeekWire
description: Ankur Sinha, who spent the past two years as an engineering director at Google, joined remittance company Remitly as its chief technology officer. Sinha, based in Seattle, most recently oversaw Googleâ€¦
